channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple has bought a game studio for the first time
item.description: Tech giant buys maker of Sneaky Sasquatch game.

item.title: Denny’s CEO says she starts any new gig by ‘walking around with a little journal’ and asking staff the same questions
item.description: Denny’s boss used to run the ship at Chili’s and Red Lobster—she says she starts every new assignment by asking employees and customers 4 very specifi...

item.title: Investors flee GameStop following $500 million Bitcoin splurge
item.description: GameStop announced the purchase of 4,710 Bitcoins on Wednesday.

item.title: Anheuser-Busch taps UFC’s Dana White for a new energy drink
How the CEO of Lumen Technologies is building the backbone of the AI economy
item.description: "We're thinking about everything completely differently. It's one of my favorite things to do. I love leading change," Johnson told Fortune.

item.title: Wall Street awaits minutes of this month’s Fed interest-rate meeting
